input_args.passage: 'Gene Hackman/Date of birth | January 30, 1930, Gene Hackman, in full Eugene Alden Hackman, (born January 30, 1930, San Bernadino, California, U.S.), American motion-picture actor known for his rugged appearance and his emotionally honest and natural performances., January 30, 1930'
input_args.claim: 'In citation it is mentioned that Gene Hackman played the role of Lex Luthor in Superman IV: The Quest for Peace.'
